topic.title: Enable Link

body.p: This check box is used to indicate whether the port is enabled for use. If the stack bifurcation is set to x2 (or x1 for management ports), then each port is enabled by default. If stack bifurcation is set to x4, then odd numbered ports are not configurable (as they are used as part of the x4 link and controlled by the even numbered ports).
Enable Link is a port level control and impacts all lanes in the port as defined by the stack bifurcation.
body.note: Enable Link indicates that the physical port is valid for use. When the physical port is enabled, the related resources and settings must be set to valid values (e.g., the connector setting of the physical port must be valid, the MC Overlay must be a valid value).
